item.title: Build Realtime Maps with Mapbox GL
item.description: In this lesson, I am going to cover the basics of building realtime map features with Angular4, Firebase, and MapBox. Here’s a highlight of what is covered in the code below. How to obtain a user’s current location How to connect Firebase data with Mapbox How to format GeoJSON data. How to quickly customize map styles. realtime interaction between two maps Initial Setup Start by signing up for a free Mapbox account, then installing mapbox-gl in your Angular project.
